column1: Lion Danshi to Otaku Joshi Hatsutaiken no Aite wa Yajuu deshita
column2: "Mm... Ohh...!" Yuri wakes up to find a super hunk groping her body... Eek! And then he grins and says nonchalantly, "Females like to make babies, don't they?" Yuri's so shy that just meeting a man's gaze makes her tremble. The only things that comfort her are her manga and Leo, a lion at her family zoo. But, has he really turned into a human being!? This king of the jungle is convinced that the best way to please a female is to make babies, and he's on the prowl 24/7. A story of love and sex that never stops sizzling with the brute force of a hot, loyal beast.from Renta!

column2: In the Frontier County of Aulanthia of the Livitium Imperial Kingdom, there lives Princess Syltianna who is… …so ugly, both in her face and in her personality.One day, Princess Syltianna, widely known with the name the Ragweed Princess of the Livitium Imperial Kingdom, is evicted by the First Queen Consort and killed in a dark forest inhabited by demon beasts. She is then saved by a passing witch, and upon her revival, she regains her memory of her previous life as a high school boy on Earth, and decides to live in the forest as the witch’s apprentice.

column2: Aoyama Keita had a crush on his classmate Haida Monako, but he was too shy to tell her. One day, when Haida suddenly passes away, he is finally able to confess to her through a letter he places at her funeral. Little does Keita know, she returns as a zombie and blackmails him into letting her stay with him with the threat that she will tell everyone about the love letter if he doesn't. Now Keita has to hide Haida from his parents, classmates and the outside world because everyone else thinks she is dead. To make matters worse, as a living dead, she craves flesh from time to time and Haida doesn’t care if it comes from Keita…

column2: Contains 8 stories. Each story possesses different characters, but the theme of love and its different forms of expression is present throughout.1. Girlfriend in the SkyHow can a girl get her boyfriend to hold hands with her?2. Ankoku-sanA pop tale about a girl full of negative thoughts.  3. Kamisama Gokko (Kami-sama Make-Believe)A girl watches over the town she lives in, believing the world is going to end. Soon she is joined by a boy who has no place to go, and they watch over the “last days” of the world together.4. Downtown Train5. Harumage.6. EkstasisA silent story about what might happen if a boy could freely touch the hair of his beloved.7. Ao8. After School Show   (The Show After School)Two classmates discuss calmly if and how much they love each other.

column2: From Seven Seas:Being reborn once may sound impressive, but Rishe is already on her seventh time around! She has had all kinds of excitement in her previous lives, from peddling goods as a merchant to locking blades as a knight, so now she’s determined to kick back and enjoy. But to savor the high life, she first has to marry the handsome prince. The same one who happens to be her murderer. It will take six-plus lifetimes of experience and skills for Rishe to break the time loop and make her extravagant dreams come true.Original MangaOfficial English (Print)

column2: Nick Morgan was way out of Cory's league. Wealthy, suave and devastatingly handsome, he was a legendary playboy who had women falling at his feet. If and when he decided to marry, surely his chosen wife would be blond and beautiful--not plain and sweet looking like Cory?But, it seemed, Nick had set his sights on conquering Cory and was determined to have her at any cost. But, she had to wonder, was it really her that he wanted, or her innocence?

column2: 1) Love Cafe?Baby-faced college student Miwa jumps at the chance to work at the elite restaurant. Being trained by strict Himekura is hard, but Miwa admires the elegant waiter and ignores the rumors that Himekura is the owner's lover. But accidentally witnessing a tender moment between them has repercussions for Miwa he never anticipated...2) Love Cafe –36.5˚C–Nobunaga loves pretty things and a regular customer Yui has cought his eye. Unfortunately Yui dislikes all the things Nobunaga recommends. Can Nobunaga get Yui's approval...?3) Love CafeA short sequel. Himekura is serving Yui and they look good together. What will Nobunaga and Miwa do?4) The Window Cleaner and the DirectorA student becomes a window cleaner as his part-time job during his summer vacation for his hobby, overseas travels. He catches the eyes of one young CEO through the window, then he is suddenly fired and goes to a job interview, but he finds himself forcibly lured into the arms of Director Tsunaga Keiichi!5) Alice and DaikichiDaikichi is a dog that goes to propose to a plush rabbit Alice everyday.6) Comment7) Marooned HoneymoonThe son of the CEO of a large company get marooned on an island with his secretary whilst on a surveying trip. 8) The Young Director's Elegant LifestyleThey finally make it back to mainland and their life as a happy couple starts now...? column2: Hina abandons trying to get a proper job and becomes a delivery prostitute in order to pay off the debt her father left her. After getting requested by her first customer, she nervously goes to the hotel... and finds out it's a super-extravagant first-class hotel suite! And then, a super hot guy appears. When she asks him what he wants, he says: "vibrator, electric massager, money shot, piss play, and masturbation viewing," then hands her a wad of bills... just who is this hot guy?!from Renta!Official Chinese TranslationOfficial Korean Translation

column1: Lv2 kara Cheat datta Moto Yuusha Kouho no Mattari Isekai Life
column2: From Seven Seas:Banaza, a young merchant, is summoned to an unfamiliar world to become a legendary hero! But his unimpressive stats disqualify him, and Banaza isn’t sent home, but exiled to the edge of a monster-filled forest. Fortune takes a turn when his first battle bumps him to Level 2–and his previously NPC-grade stats leap to infinity! Banaza is determined to live a normal life despite his god-level power, but his world is turned upside down yet again when he meets Fenrys–a fair maiden who happens to be a fiendish demon. Kick back and chill with Banaza’s tale of cheating his way to an easygoing existence in a thrilling fantasy world.Original manga online

column1: M Kyoushi: Mochizuki Sensei no Himitsu
column2: • The Mochizuki Sensei Observation DiaryAll the students in Class B have the hots for Mochizuki Sensei. By accident, one of them will find out her secret when trying to sneak into the Teachers’ Bathroom. From that point on, he’ll follow Mochizuki Sensei almost everywhere, and will keep a diary of her various sexual encounters with members of the school staff and some of the students.-- Nemui

column2: The Diary of Ma-chan is the official debut work of Osamu Tezuka, who serialized it in 1946. It follows the life of a little preschooler named Ma-chan, and all of the shenanigans he gets wrapped up in.Also Includes:- "Chinnen and Kyo-chan": The daily life in Kyoto of Chinnen, a monk in training.- "A-chan B-ko-chan Expedition Log": A long-form gag-adventure story. A pair of siblings explore several areas and even worlds as they help find things and deal with issues for others.- "The Antenna Family": A family comedy with themes of television.- "Gucchan": The everyday life of the rambunctious little boy Gucchan, his family, and his group of friends.- "Lively Sei-chan": A glimpse in the life of the spirited young Sei-chan, his family, and their daily troubles and fun.- "Chief Detective Kenichi" (Newspaper Chapters): An alternate serialization of Chief Detective Kenichi. An episodic series of two-page cases of differing natures involving the titular chief detective.- "Mrs. Denko": A short series involving the chaotic daily life of a family while also showcasing electronics.- "Good Morning! Cusco": Cusco is a widow from Peru who has just moved in with her brother's family. With her curious inventions, Cusco brings lots of chaos to those around her.
